select order_id orderId, order_all_cost orderPrice, order_state orderStateId, store_id storeId, recipient_name userName, recipient_phone phone, pay_time payTime, version from t_info_order where is_delete = 0
and recipient_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and recipient_phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and order_id like concat('%', #{orderId}, '%')
and order_state like concat('%', #{orderStateId}, '%')
and to_char(pay_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{beginTime}
and to_char(pay_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{endTime}
order by update_time desc
